name: Fintelligence Calculator
author: support@fintelligence.com.au

sections.description:
Ambition Cloud is a cloud based multi-faceted platform by Fintelligence that creates an ecosystem that your brokers will live in. Designed by experienced finance asset brokers, Ambition Cloud is easy to use and seamlessly integrates into your business. The system can be adapted to suit your work flows and internal processes. It has built in API capabilities to increase your teams productivity and reduce the time it takes to settle a deal. As a business owner, Ambition Cloud provides insights from your data to better understand and streamline your business.
This plugin provides a calculator you can embed on your site to allow a user to calculate their asset loan repayments (car, boat, bike, caravan etc).
You can change the background colour, title colours, the default amount and rates all via the block or shortcode. An example of a full shortcode with all parameters is displayed below.

[fintelligence-calculator title='testing' default_rate='2.1' default_amount='30000' default_rate='4.45' summary_title='Your Loan Summary' bg_colour='#FFFFFF' title_colour='#40318C' text_colour='inherit' summary_bg_colour='#ED3D95 summary_title_colour='#40318C summary_text_colour='#FFFFFF'']
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder ‘gravity-forms-custom-post-types’ to your `/wp-content/plugins/` folder, or install via the plugin repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Once activated you can add to your page or post by using the Calculator Block or by using the [fintelligence-calculator] shortcode.

An example of a full shortcode with all parameters is displayed below.

[fintelligence-calculator title='testing' default_rate='2.1' default_amount='30000' default_rate='4.45' summary_title='Your Loan Summary' bg_colour='#FFFFFF' title_colour='#40318C' text_colour='inherit' summary_bg_colour='#ED3D95 summary_title_colour='#40318C summary_text_colour='#FFFFFF'']
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed rate input field

1.0.1

  • Added CTA Button

1.0

  • It’s all new!

short_description: Add a payment calculator to allow on the fly calculations by visitors
